doc.title: Bao yu jiao yang
doc.plot: Simon Yam plays an ex-con that spent the last ten years of his life in prison for defending the lives of his best friend and his best friend's sister. While in jail he learns to become a teacher's aide. In school he comes across these troubled teens who start hanging around a sleazy low-level triad that runs a video arcade, luring kids by exchanging games for drug running. Yam eventually befriends the kids pissing off the triad who gets him fired by digging up dirt on his past. But he doesn't care, he proposes to his girlfriend and she says yes but a student is still held under the grasp of the triad. So Yam goes back into action to try and free the kid and ridding the neighborhood of the sleazy scumbag. Can Simon Yam reach the kid and change his ways? Will Simon Yam and Anita Yuen live happily ever after?
